description:
A premium base layer that will keep you warm on the coldest of days, the Merino Long Sleeve Roll Neck features a 100% merino wool fabric with luxuriously soft 15.5 micron fibers for the ultimate in next-to-skin softness. Naturally stretchy, breathable and odor resistant, this top also feature a high neck that doubles as a face mask and extended sleeves with integrated fingerless mittens and thumb loops for added protection from the elements. Forward-set side seams and flatlock stitching throughout ensures a soft, chafe-free feel.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Merino LS Roll Neck - Mens
